concept.title: Using the term Element When Defining a Term

conbody.p: How should an expansion of acronym, abbreviation or other term be handled? For example, in the snippet:

lq.q: technologies such as XML Localization Interchange File Format (XLIFF)

conbody.codeblock: technologies such as XML Localization Interchange File Format (<term>XLIFF</term>)
technologies such as <term>XML Localization Interchange File Format</term> (<term>XLIFF</term>)
technologies such as <term>XML Localization Interchange File Format</term> (XLIFF)
